content.question: In The Swing (after Fragonard), Yinka Shonibare recreates Fragonard’s Rococo painting in order to

choices.label: draw parallels between the French Revolution and the end of apartheid in South Africa
allude to the effects of European colonialism and question the morality of excess wealth
address the objectification of women in paintings from the Rococo period in France
pay homage to the complex spatial structure of Fragonard’s work by recreating it in three dimensions

content.answer: allude to the effects of European colonialism and question the morality of excess wealth

topic.text: 10.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
